links.title: Should You Be Concerned By Ford Motor Company's $117 Billion Debt?
links.description: Yeah, you read that right. ( Ford Motor Company NYSE:F) has amassed roughly $117 billion in debt, as of its financial reporting in the latest earnings quarter (link opens a PDF). So where does all of that debt come from, and is that a company you really want to be putting your hard-earned money into?

links.title: Sunday links: a relentless pursuit
links.description: Stocktoberfest East 2018 is coming to NYC on April 25th. There is a great lineup of speakers and Howard Lindzon has $100 discount codes for the taking. Don't miss it. "Trying to constantly find reasons for a market correction while ignoring all the reasons for the market to rise is a bias but maybe also some form of mental condition if it is a persistent and relentless pursuit."
